<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82049</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82049</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4812</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Primitive Art</string>
            <string language="es">Arte primitivo</string>
            <string language="ga">Ealaíon Chianach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ursprüngliche Kunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Art Primitif</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arte Primitiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte Primitiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρωτόγονη τέχνη</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Primitive art project involving research, through the use of slides and pictures, sourcing of ideas and the planning of a sculpture.</string>
            <string language="es">Arte primitivo relacionado con la investigación, mediante el uso de diapositivas e imágenes, creación de ideas y la planificación de una escultura.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tionscadal ealaíne cianaigh ina bhfuil taighde, trí úsáid  sleamhnáin agu pictiúir, smaointe a fháil agus dealbhóireacht a phleanáil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Art</string>
            <string language="es">Arte. Proyecto</string>
            <string language="ga">Ealaín</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Project</string>
            <string language="ga">Tionscadal</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ursprüngliches kunstprojekt, das Forschung, 
durch den Gebrauch von Plättchen und Abbildungen, Auftreten von Ideen
und die Planung einer Skulptur mit einbezieht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet primitif d'art comportant la recherche, 
par l'utilisation des glissières et des images, l'approvisonnement des 
idées et la planification d'une sculpture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto primitivo da arte que envolve a pesquisa,
com o uso das corrediças e dos retratos, o sourcing das idéias e o 
planeamento de um sculpture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto primitivo di arte che coinvolge ricerca,
con l'uso degli scorrevoli e delle immagini, il sourcing delle idee e 
la progettazione di una scultura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρωτόγονο πρόγραμμα τέχνης που περιλαμβάνει την 
έρευνα, μέσω της χρήσης των φωτογραφικών διαφανειών και των 
εικόνων, της πρόσβασης των ιδεών και του προγραμματισμού ενός 
γλυπτού.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kunst</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projekt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Art</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόγραμμα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
